name: Fractured Sunrise (DEMO)
description:
HeliOS, a city run by completely by AI. Where everything you ever own has a memory chip, and nothing is private. You are Taango, a roomba robot. It is your job to keep apartment 2234 clean, no matter the cost. 

Originally created for the Global Game Jam 2020 in 48 hours, this project was developed further during the pandemic in 2021. 

Credits: Arnoud Poll Jonker, Damian van Hoorn, Gerben Pasjes, Leon Tukker,  Niels Leenders, Sander van Zanten, Steff Kempink
